title: Chiropractor Bridgeville, South Fayette Township PA | Greer Chiropractic & Rehabilitation
author: - Bekki H
description: Bridgeville Chiropractor Dr. Adam Greer wants to help everyone feel better, get better, and stay that way. Contact us for more information. Insurance accepted.
cleaned_text: Bridgeville Chiropractor Promotes Natural Health and Wellness [Bridgeville Chiropractor Dr. Adam Greer](https://www.greerchiro.com/dr-adam-greer/) is all about community. A native son of the area, he always knew he would come home to establish his practice. Giving back to his community and South Fayette Township, as well as promoting the benefits of natural health care as an alternative to medications and surgery, are important to him.
